events.name: Windows 8 Hackathon (Duke)
events.about:
Our Hackathon is an open Windows 8 code fest. Code to your heart’s content and get familiar with all of the great Windows 8 features. It’s the perfect opportunity to get your dream application underway, or to finish that app you’ve already started.

This 24-hour event will be filled with coding, sharing and plenty of food. Bring your own laptop installed with Windows 8 Release Preview (or RTM), your apps and your cool ideas and get ready to create! At the end of the hackathon, you’ll get to show-off your app. The best apps will walk away with prizes!

  • Start Time: Friday, September 21, 6pm
  • End Time: Saturday, September 22, 6pm
  • Location: Fitzpatrick Center, Schiciano Auditorium

events.name: Epic Durham Hack Day
events.about:
EPIC DURHAM HACK DAY

 ** This event is not for idea guys **

Come hack on interesting products with your fellow developers and designers. We have no rigid agenda, you don't have to start a company or try to launch something, it's just a great excuse to meet new people, work on interesting code, and try to come up with something cool enough to show off to your peers.

It will kick off at 10AM with a bar-camp like call for projects - you can go to the front of the room and talk about what you would like to build and if anyone wants to join in they can join your team or you can hack on it alone!

At 6:00, 9:00, and 12:00 we will have Demo times where you can show off what you have been working on to everyone else. Stay as long as you want or head out early!

We will have Coffee, Bagels, Fullsteam Beer, Pizza, Snacks and more!

Sponsored by Adzerk, The American Underground, Durham Chamber of Commerce, Shoeboxed (and more to come, email james at adzerk.com if you want to help out!)
